TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaRotationBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制旋轉操作在慣性期間的減速。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a rotation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會指定旋轉操作時慣性的行為。The class specifies how a rotation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用屬性事件，以執行下列動作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 藉由設定開始時指定慣性的初始速度屬性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 當慣性結束藉由設定時指定之操作所需的旋轉屬性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 設定指定慣性所需的減速屬性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下列範例所示事件處理常式，並設定所需的減速的轉譯、 擴充，以及使用慣性期間的旋轉。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 這個範例是在較大範例的一部分[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DesiredDeceleration { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旋轉變慢的速率 (以每平方毫秒的度數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

value.span: 旋轉變慢的速率 (以每平方毫秒的度數為單位)。

span.span: The rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所需的減速慣性。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double DesiredRotation { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定慣性移動結束時的旋轉 (以度數為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.

value.span: 慣性移動結束時的旋轉 (以度數為單位)。

span.span: The rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定所要的旋轉的操作，慣性結束時。Use the property to specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends. 設定或，但非兩者。Set either the or the , but not both. 當您設定這些屬性時，其他的屬性變更為有值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double InitialVelocity { double get(); void set(double value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定旋轉在慣性階段開始時的初始速率。

span.span: Gets or sets the initial rate of the rotation at the start of the inertia phase.

value.span: 旋轉在慣性階段開始時的初始速率。

span.span: The initial rate of the rotation at the start of the inertia phase.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需操作的詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 如需操作回應的應用程式的範例，請參閱[逐步解說： 建立您第一個接觸的應用程式](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
